name: AcquireEntityView
comments: Showed when a hero acquires one or more units, resources, magic, experience, skill points or artifacts.

name: ConditionalAcquireEntityView
comments: Showed when a hero can acquire one or more units, resources, magic, experience, skill points or artifacts, with certain prices, in world adventure map.

name: HeroDetailsView
comments: Showed a hero's details (units, artifacts, skill points etc) when it is selected in the world adventure view.

name: WorldMapObjectGarrisonView
comments: Showed when a hero visits an owned mine or a border gate.

name: BorderGateOrBorderGuardView
comments: Showed when a hero visits a border gate / border guard in world adventure map. Note: if you have the colored key, colored border gate will not show this dialog.

name: BorderGateOrBorderGuardCanPassView
comments: Showed when a hero visits a border gate / border guard in world adventure map. Note: only applicable for non-colored border gate, or any boarder guard. This dialog will only show once for this particular building when visited with key obtained or quest finished.

name: DiplomacyView
comments: Showed when a map unit wishes to join your current hero (optionally with a price) or retrieve, after a hero proactively encounters a unit in world adventure map.

name: UnitAbandonView
comments: Showed when a hero needs to abandon one or more units after any unit acquisition event happens while the hero has no empty unit slot.

name: UnitUpgradeView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the Hill Fort building in world adventure map.

name: TownPortalSelectionView
comments: Showed when a hero invokes TownPortal skill in world adventure map.

name: MagicGuildView
comments: Showed when the magic guild building is clicked in town view.

name: BuyMagicBookView
comments: Showed when the player clicks the magic guild building in town view, but the hero has no magic book.

name: MagicBookView
comments: Showed when a hero opens the magic book in world adventure map or in town view.

name: MagicDetailsView
comments: Showed when a hero views the details of a magic, when magic book view is active.

name: UnitDetailsView
comments: Showed when recruiting a unit, or when viewing a unit which is in hero's unit slot or in garrison, in town management or world adventure view.

name: HeroExchangeView
comments: Showed when a hero visits another allied hero in world adventure map.

name: EntitySacrificeView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the sacrifice altar in world adventure map.

name: MarketPlaceView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the trading port in world adventure map.

name: FactionComparisonView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the Den of Thieves building in world adventure map.

name: PuzzleMapView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the obelisk building, or invokes ViewPuzzle button in in world adventure map.

name: SeerHutQuestView
comments: Showed when a hero visits a seer hut building in world adventure map for the first time that the quest wasn't discovered yet.

name: SeerHutQuestResponseView
comments: Showed when a hero visits a seer hut building in world adventure map after the quest target was achieved and the dialog allows player to choose a reward.

name: ArtifactBlackMarketView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the artifact black market building in world adventure map.

name: VisitingGuardedMineView
comments: Showed when a hero visits a guarded mine/lighthouse in world adventure map.

name: TreasureChestView
comments: Showed when a hero visits a treasure chest.

name: ArenaView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the Arena building in world adventure map.

name: SchoolOfWarView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the School of War building in world adventure map.

name: CartographerView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the cartographer building in world adventure map.

name: UnitSellingView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the Freelancer's Guild building in world adventure map.

name: ShipyardView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the shipyard building in world adventure map; or when flagged, the dialog is opened by clicking.

name: TavernView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the Tavern building in world adventure map.

name: TreeOfWisdomView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the Tree of Wisdom building in world adventure map.

name: WarMachineFactoryView
comments: Showed when a hero visits the War Machine Factory building in world adventure map.
